sentence.text: The presence of positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport loss-of-function variants in negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II predicted isolated diabetes, isolated deafness, or isolated congenital cataracts without development of the full syndrome (sensitivity 100% [93%-100%]; specificity 78% [73%-82%]).

entity.text: positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
